Pee Cubiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Hoffman, Appellant, v. Hoffman.
Argued April 15, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
